error.wrong-mnemonic-word: Wrong recovery phrase. Please double-check these words: {index}.

error.duration-lange: The duration should be between {minDuration} and {maxDuration} minutes.

error.channel-is-not-open-state: Channel is not on OPEN STATE

pages.register.components.bip-44-path.co: Closing this box will reset the HD Path. Are you sure you want to proceed?
pages.register.components.bip-44-path.pa: You can create multiple addresses from one recovery phrase
A lost path cannot be recovered
If you're unfamiliar with this feature, skip or undo this step -> <reset>Reset Settings</reset>
pages.register.intro-new-user.title: Welcome to Keplr
pages.register.intro-new-user.paragraph: Select the way you want to create your wallet
pages.register.intro-new-user.recovery-p: Maximum control & high compatibility across all wallets
pages.register.intro-existing-user.title: Welcome Back to Keplr
pages.register.intro-existing-user.recov: Use an existing 12/24 word recovery phrase or private key. You can also import wallets from other wallet providers.
Use recovery phrase or private key
pages.register.intro-existing-user.socia: Log in with the same email address to import an existing account to Keplr.
Select a hardware wallet that you would like to use with Keplr
pages.register.new-mnemonic.title: New Recovery Phrase
pages.register.new-mnemonic.recovery-war: DO NOT share your recovery phrase with ANYONE.
Anyone with your recovery phrase can have full control over your assets. Please stay vigilant against phishing attacks at all times.
pages.register.new-mnemonic.back-up-warn: You will never be able to restore your account without your recovery phrase.
pages.register.verify-mnemonic.title: Verify Your Recovery Phrase
pages.register.verify-mnemonic.paragraph: Fill out the words according to their numbers to verify that you have stored your phrase safely.
pages.register.verify-mnemonic.no-mnemon: Recovery Phrase and bip44Path should be provided
pages.register.verify-mnemonic.verify-bo: Ref of verify box is null
pages.register.name-password.title: Set Up Your Wallet
pages.register.recover-mnemonic.title: Import Existing Wallet
pages.register.recover-mnemonic.paragrap: Enter your recovery phrase here to restore your wallet. Or click on any blank and paste the entire phrase.
Enter the phrase in the right order without capitalization, punctuation symbols, or spaces.
pages.register.back-up-private-key.title: Back up private key
pages.register.back-up-private-key.blur-: Click here to see private key
pages.register.back-up-private-key.warni: Anyone with your private key can have access to your assets.{br}{br}If you lose access to your Gmail Account, the only way to recover your wallet is using your private key. Keep this in a safe place.
pages.register.connect-ledger.title: Please connect your Hardware wallet
pages.register.connect-ledger.paragraph: To use EVM-compatible chains (Injective, Evmos) with Keplr, you'll be prompted to connect to Ethereum app in the next steps.
pages.register.connect-ledger.open-app-s: Open the {app} app on your Ledger device.
pages.register.connect-ledger.use-hid-co: Please enable ‘experimental web platform features’ to use Web HID
pages.register.connect-keystone.title: Please Connect Your Hardware Wallet
pages.register.connect-keystone.step-1: Tap “Connect Software Wallet” at the bottom left corner on the Keystone device.
pages.register.connect-keystone.step-3: Click on the “Sync Keystone” button below to scan the QR code displayed on the Keystone device.
pages.register.connect-keystone.click-to: Click here to view detailed tutorial
pages.register.connect-keystone.paragrap: Scan the QR code displayed on your Keystone device
pages.register.connect-keystone.position: Position the QR code in front of your camera.
pages.register.connect-keystone.enable-c: Please enable your camera permission via [Settings]
pages.register.connect-keystone.select-v: Please ensure you have selected a valid QR code from your Keystone device.
pages.register.enable-chains.title: Select Chains
pages.register.enable-chains.paragraph: Don’t worry, you can change your selections anytime in the Manage Chain Visibility in the sidebar menu.
pages.register.enable-chains.guide.can-s: You can select EVM chains in the next step.
pages.register.select-derivation-path.pa: To use both paths, you need to go through the import process twice.
pages.register.pages.welcome.title: Account Created!
pages.register.pages.welcome.follow-twit: For all important information and updates on Keplr.
page.register.google.title: Sign in with Google
page.register.google.paragraph: Create a wallet linked to your Google account.
page.setting.title: Settings
page.setting.manage-token-list-paragraph: Only for the tokens that can be added manually via contract addresses
page.setting.advanced.endpoint.confirm-p: You need to restart Keplr to apply changes
page.setting.advanced.endpoint.guide-par: Please get in touch with the endpoint providers to address any issues that may arise from changes to the endpoint(s).{br}{br}Restart Keplr to apply changes.
page.setting.general.manage-non-native-c: Non-native chains should be first added to Keplr to manage their visibility.
page.setting.general.manage-chain-visibi: Select chains (and their assets) to be displayed on your current account
page.setting.general.authz.revoke.title: Authz Details
page.setting.general.link-keplr-mobile.c: You cannot export Ledger-based accounts to Keplr Mobile. These must be imported to your mobile device directly from the Ledger.{br}Accounts that are created via social logins that are not supported by Keplr Mobile cannot be exported.
page.setting.general.link-keplr-mobile.e: Scanning the QR code outside of Keplr Mobile can lead to loss of funds
Scan QR code to export accounts to Keplr Mobile. The process may take several minutes.
page.setting.general.link-keplr-mobile.q: Scan the QR code to sync with Keplr Mobile. The process may take several minutes.
page.setting.general.delete-suggest-chai: The infrastructure and setting of this chain is not configured by Keplr team. Please reach out to the chain or website team for technical support.
page.setting.security.connected-websites: Websites that can view your address and make requests for signing
page.setting.security.analytics-paragrap: Help us improve the performance and quality of Keplr
page.setting.security.auto-lock.paragrap: You can set how long it takes Keplr to automatically lock.
page.setting.security.auto-lock.sleep-mo: Lock Keplr when the device is{br}in sleep mode
page.setting.token.manage.paragraph: Only for the tokens that can be added manually via contract addresses
page.setting.token.manage.token-view.dis: Are you sure you’d like to disable this token? You will not be able to see your balance or transfer until you add it again.
page.setting.token.add.title: Add Token Manually
page.setting.token.add.viewing-key-info-: I have my own viewing key
By enabling this toggle, you confirm that you have your viewing key and use it for adding this token.
page.setting.token.add.contract-address-: Search by token name or ticker
page.setting.contacts.list.dropdown.dele: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
page.setting.contacts.add.label-placehol: A short nickname to identify the contact
page.setting.contacts.add.memo-placehold: Required for sending to centralized exchange
page.suggest-chain.title: Add {chainName} to Keplr
page.suggest-chain.community-info-view.p: {origin} would like to add blockchain {chainId} to Keplr.
page.suggest-chain.raw-info-view.guide-p: This chain’s info is not available on Keplr Chain Registry. Keplr recommends that ‘suggest chain’ info be managed by the community.
page.suggest-chain.raw-info-view.chain-r: Click here to update chain info on Github
page.suggest-chain.origin-info-view.guid: Adding this chain requires information from a web page that is not managed by Keplr.
page.unlock.bottom-section.guide-title: Don’t close your browser during update
page.unlock.bottom-section.guide-paragra: Migration for users with many accounts can take up to several minutes.
page.wallet.title: Select Wallet
page.wallet.delete.warning-paragraph: Make sure that you’ve backed up your recovery phrase and private key.
page.wallet.delete.paragraph:
After deletion, you will be required to import your wallet to restore
  your access to it.
page.wallet.show-sensitive.paragraph: Please type in your password to proceed
page.ibc-transfer.title: Advanced IBC Transfer
page.ibc-transfer.select-channel.warning: Most of the centralized exchanges do not support IBC transfers
We advise you not to perform IBC transfers to these exchanges, as your assets may be lost. Please check with the exchange's policies before initiating any IBC transfers.
page.ibc-swap.error.no-route-found: No routes found for this swap
page.ibc-swap.warning.unable-to-populate: Unable to retrieve {assets} price from Coingecko. Check the fiat values of input and output from other sources before clicking "Next".
page.ibc-swap.warning.high-price-impact: Due to a lack of liquidity, there is a significant difference in the USD value between the assets before and after the swap. Click "Next" if you still want to proceed.
page.ibc-swap.components.swap-fee-info.b: Launch Event: Swap with 0% Keplr fee until the end of the year 2023
page.permission.paragraph: By approving this request, the website will:{br}• Get the list of all chain on your Keplr Wallet
page.sign.cosmos.tx.title: Confirm Transaction
page.sign.cosmos.tx.authz-send-grant.war: You are allowing another account to transfer assets from your wallet for the specified period of time. Beware of scammers and approve with caution.
page.sign.cosmos.tx.warning-paragraph: Error: SIGN_MODE_DIRECT can’t be signed on Ledger. Contact the web app provider to fix this issue.
page.sign.cosmos.tx.high-fee-warning: The transaction fee is unusually high.{br}I confirm and agree to proceed, nevertheless.

page.main.search-placeholder: Search for asset or chain (i.e. ATOM, Cosmos)
page.main.available.available-balance-to: The amount of your assets that are available for use or transfer immediately, except for those that are currently staked or locked in LP pools.
page.main.available.empty-view-paragraph: Gear up yourself by topping up your wallet!
page.main.staked.staked-balance-tooltip: Tokens that are delegated to validators and earning rewards.
page.main.staked.unstaking-balance-toolt: Tokens that are under the unbonding period.
page.main.staked.empty-view-paragraph: Stake your assets to earn rewards and contribute to maintaining the networks!

page.main.layouts.header.new-chain.parag: To show the chains and their assets on this account, visit "Manage Chain Visibility".
page.ledger-grant.title: Allow Browser to Connect to Ledger
page.ledger-grant.paragraph: You need to reapprove connection to your Ledger. Select the appropriate app, and after successfully connecting with your Ledger device, close this page and retry your previous transaction (signing).
